alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Botetourt; City of Roanoke; Roanoke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 23 at 8:50PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of south central Virginia and west central Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, in south central Virginia, Bedford. In west central Virginia, Botetourt, City of Roanoke and Roanoke. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 846 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported flooding in the advisory area. Minor flooding is still occurring. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bore Auger Creek, Carvin Creek, Back Creek, Cook Creek, Buffalo Creek and Coyner Branch. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Roanoke... Vinton... Stewartsville... Cloverdale... Laymantown... Hollins... Blue Ridge... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Botetourt; City of Roanoke; Roanoke
